docs.lead_paragraph: Senators McCain and Obama spent a great deal of the debate talking about the economy, the bailout and health care. But foreign policy dominated quite a lot of the conversation, too. This was the only town-hall setting the two agreed to attend. Next debate is Oct. 15.
